pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robustness Checks for Omitted Variable Bias // Robustness checks for omitted variable bias. The package includes robustness checks proposed by Oster (2019). 'robomit' replicates (and extends) function available in Stata (closed source) for use in R (open source). See: Oster, E. 2019. doi:10.1080/07350015.2016.1227711.
